name: Doppelgänger (itch)
description:
Created by students in The University of Texas at Austin GAMMA Program, Doppelgänger is a stealth-puzzle game in which you play an agent who must use wits and time manipulation to infiltrate The Corporation and obtain The Secret.

Thank you for taking the time to visit. There is a trailer on the right and the game can be downloaded below. We hope you enjoy the experience.
